text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":11,"explanation":"The XML contained several garbled Unicode characters, likely due to encoding issues, which have been corrected to their proper German equivalents (e.g., 'müllerischen', 'verständigen', 'Hauß-Patter', 'neu', 'zu', 'frantzösischen'). Structurally, the first book entry had a malformed <TITLE> tag where the author was incorrectly nested and the title was split; this has been corrected by encompassing the full title within a single <TITLE> tag and placing the <AUTHOR> tag as a sibling. Additionally, the entry for Fleury's 'Kirchen-Historien' was missing its enclosing <BIBL> tags, which have been added."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The XML contained several garbled Unicode characters, likely due to encoding issues, which have been corrected to their proper German equivalents (e.g., 'müllerischen', 'verständigen', 'Hauß-Patter', 'neu', 'zu', 'frantzösischen'). Structurally, the first book entry had a malformed <TITLE> tag where the author was incorrectly nested and the title was split; this has been corrected by encompassing the full title within a single <TITLE> tag and placing the <AUTHOR> tag as a sibling. Additionally, the entry for Fleury's 'Kirchen-Historien' was missing its enclosing <BIBL> tags, which have been added.
